snippet.title: The Black Pepper Crew | Turn-Based Tactics | Gameplay
snippet.description:
A first look at The Black Pepper Crew Demo by Quiji. A Turn-Based Tactics game with different colorful animal heroes, pixel art that I love, and very tactical battles. Let me know what you think about in the comments below. #TheBlackPepperCrew #TurnBasedTactics

About The Black Pepper Crew
Use your wit to plan and execute bounty hunting jobs while fighting thugs around the city on this tactical turn-based experience. Strategize around the unique abilities of a mischievous crew: a retired boxer frog, a ninja cat, a hacker chicken and a thief raccoon. 
https://quiji.itch.io/the-black-pepper-crew

❤️ Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmiURpCHwm7vRE9Pln1br8g/join

🔔 OUR SOCIAL PAGES AND AFFILIATE LINKS TO SUPPORT US
- Website: https://turnbasedlovers.com
- Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/turnbasedlovers
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/turnbasedlovers
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/turnbasedlovers
- Steam Curator: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/29618454-Turn-based-games
- Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/?partner=tbl
